org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl.typedetection

Class MimeExtractorRepo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl.typedetection.MimeExtractorRepo

  • public class MimeExtractorRepo
extends Object
    Repo of extractor spec and naming conventions mapped by mime-type.
    Author:
    mattmann (Chris Mattmann), bfoster (Brian Foster)
